event.title: 3 May 1492 the mentioned Fernandez de Lugo finishes

data.event: On 3 May 1492 the mentioned Fernandez de Lugo finishes the conquest of the island of La Palma by the Spanish when conquering the last remaining stronghold of the native Guanches, the kingdom of Acer√≥.

event.title: this year the new Spanish Constitution paved

data.event: In this year the new Spanish Constitution paved the way for decentralisation of the Canary Islands and subdivision into municipalities.[1]
